page.title: 11Community Affairs
page.content: Kingsdown is generally a law abiding community. Very few people's houses have been burgled but quite a lot of property has been stolen from the neighbourhood.There are a few vandals in the village.A couple of people have been attacked,but not many people seem to be worried about going out at night.Many young people get into trouble and other people think this is because there is not enough for them to do and they are bored,so they would like more things to be organised for young people. Lots of people do not think modern parents do their job properly. The majority of the village think that the law is firm enough with criminals apart from when it comes to murder.They then think there should be longer sentences.
